description: This course is the capstone experience of the ME degree. Students will work in teams on a project of their choice, a process or a product in an area/industry of interest. In addition to the learning outcomes form the BE design, the ME design will allow students to cover the modelling/design of specific aspects in more detail, using skills gained from their ME level courses. Aspects of entrepreneurship, building a business case and funding mechanisms for engineering projects will be covered and applied in the project.
